attributes.action: Stop Fluoride in tap water UK/Northern ireland
attributes.additional_details:
People need to know that no amounts of fluoride is safe for human compustion but we are intaking it daily please stand up for the right cause people make a change today and not tomorrow.
http://bebrainfit.com/fluoride-neurotoxin/

attributes.background: Fluoride has been classed as one of the most dangerous neurotoxin in no way is acceptable that fluoride is added to tap water and bottle water and not labelled company's are claiming their is no fluoride but when tested 3rd party fluoride in high amounts ppm have been found google it.fluroide=cancer
